name: part_003
file: tmp_【チラ見せ枠・夜公演】AZKi Major Debut LiVE「声音エントロピー」【#AZKiワンマン #AZKiワンマン横浜夜】 [Sg8ijuHDcx0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Promotion for AZKi's Major Debut Live 'Koe no Entropy' and her Major 1st Album 'Route If', featuring a preview of the title track 'Entropy'.
Previews of various tracks from the album 'Route If', including 'Lazy', 'Inochi', '開けない夜があったなら', and '夜の箱庭'.
Ending title card for AZKi Major 1st Album 'Route If'.

subtitles.original: 急遽！追加公演決定！
subtitles.english: Sudden! Additional performance decided!

subtitles.original: さなぎだって これなら遠くへ
subtitles.english: Even a chrysalis, with this, can go far

subtitles.original: さなぎだって
subtitles.english: Even a chrysalis

subtitles.original: 信じて 信じて 信じたくて
subtitles.english: Believe, believe, I want to believe

subtitles.original: 歌を教え合って 出来るなら 絶対
subtitles.english: Teaching each other songs, if we can, absolutely

subtitles.original: 壊れても 壊れても 静かに小さな欠片が
subtitles.english: Even if it breaks, even if it breaks, quiet small fragments

subtitles.original: 蘇る 音 こんなに大事に感じるのは きっと 君との絆だからね
subtitles.english: The sound revives; the reason it feels so precious is surely because of my bond with you

subtitles.original: 今夜は 分岐は無限でも 君と交差した時の果て
subtitles.english: Tonight, even if the branches are infinite, the end of time when I crossed paths with you

subtitles.original: 期待値が高すぎたって そこに追いついて
subtitles.english: Even if expectations were too high, catching up to them

subtitles.original: 鋭利な感謝を差し出す夢を
subtitles.english: A dream of offering sharp gratitude

subtitles.original: 今夜は 不純なのだって 嘘は負ける
subtitles.english: Tonight, even if it's impure, lies will lose

subtitles.original: 星が指してしまう 綺麗な世界で生きていた
subtitles.english: The stars point to it; I lived in a beautiful world

subtitles.original: 偽りも見抜いて心のまま Cut in
subtitles.english: See through the lies and just as your heart desires, cut in

subtitles.original: あー 一言みたいな夜だ
subtitles.english: Ah, it's a night like a single word

subtitles.original: ばらまいた星だけが キラリ澄んでいる
subtitles.english: Only the scattered stars are sparkling and clear

subtitles.original: そんなに綺麗にはなれないや それでも今夜行くための歌
subtitles.english: I can't become that beautiful, but still, a song to move through tonight

subtitles.original: あー ほんの小さな夜だ 寝るには早く
subtitles.english: Ah, it's a tiny night, too early to sleep

subtitles.original: 夜明けはまだ遠く 憧れるには遅く 挫けるにはまだ早いよ
subtitles.english: Dawn is still far, too late to yearn, too early to give up

subtitles.original: 言葉は いつまでも下手だよ
subtitles.english: Words are always clumsy

subtitles.original: ため息だけが 上手になるよ
subtitles.english: Only sighing becomes skillful

subtitles.original: 傷つくたび 違う生き物だと知るの
subtitles.english: Every time I'm hurt, I learn that we are different creatures

subtitles.original: いつだって暗闇で迷子
subtitles.english: Always a lost child in the darkness

subtitles.original: 開けない 夜があったなら
subtitles.english: If there was a night that wouldn't end

subtitles.original: このまま 溶けて 消えたいな
subtitles.english: I'd want to just melt and disappear like this

subtitles.original: 開けない 夜があったって
subtitles.english: Even if there's a night that wouldn't end

subtitles.original: 私は 煌めく星に なれなくていい
subtitles.english: I don't need to become a sparkling star

subtitles.original: 煌めく星に なれなくていい
subtitles.english: I don't need to become a sparkling star

subtitles.original: あー 本日の閉店です
subtitles.english: Ah, we are closed for today

subtitles.original: どうにかこうにか 1日
subtitles.english: Somehow, another day

subtitles.original: ひっそりこっそり よく頑張り 何かは残せたのでしょうか
subtitles.english: Quietly, secretly, doing my best; was I able to leave something behind?

subtitles.original: 希望的だ
subtitles.english: It's hopeful

subtitles.original: 刹那的だ
subtitles.english: It's ephemeral

subtitles.original: 楽観的だ
subtitles.english: It's optimistic

subtitles.original: でも きっと 眩しいよ
subtitles.english: But surely, it's dazzling

subtitles.original: 言葉は いつまでも下手だよ
subtitles.english: Words are always clumsy

subtitles.original: ため息だけが 上手になるよ
subtitles.english: Only sighing becomes skillful

subtitles.original: 傷ついて 違う生き物だと知って
subtitles.english: Being hurt and knowing we are different creatures

subtitles.original: それでも 精一杯 歌うよ
subtitles.english: Even so, I will sing with all my might

subtitles.original: 泣きたい 夜があったなら
subtitles.english: If there was a night I wanted to cry

subtitles.original: 笑えない 夜があったなら
subtitles.english: If there was a night I couldn't laugh

subtitles.original: 溶けて 消えて なくなって
subtitles.english: Melt away, disappear, and be gone

subtitles.original: きっと もう一度 ゼロから 始めよう
subtitles.english: Surely, let's start over once more from zero

subtitles.original: 明日のことは 分からないや
subtitles.english: I don't know about tomorrow

subtitles.original: 昨日のことは 知らないや
subtitles.english: I don't know about yesterday

subtitles.original: 開けない 夜があったって
subtitles.english: Even if there's a night that wouldn't end

subtitles.original: 私は 煌めく星に なれなくていい
subtitles.english: I don't need to become a sparkling star

subtitles.original: 煌めく星に なれなくていい
subtitles.english: I don't need to become a sparkling star

subtitles.original: そんな今夜 素敵に 生きるための歌
subtitles.english: On such a night, a song to live wonderfully
